content:
Great choice on considering an upgrade!

The Toyota Corolla, Hyundai Elantra, and Mazda3 are all excellent options in the compact sedan segment. Here's an overview of the latest models to help you make an informed decision:

**Toyota Corolla (2022 and newer)**

* Redesigned for 2022, the Corolla features a more aggressive exterior design, improved interior space, and enhanced safety features.
* Available trim levels: L, LE, SE, XLE, XSE, and Hybrid LE, XLE, and Limited.
* Powertrain options:
	+ 1.8L 4-cylinder engine (139 hp, 126 lb-ft torque)
	+ 2.0L 4-cylinder engine (169 hp, 151 lb-ft torque) on SE and XSE trims
	+ Hybrid model combines 1.8L engine with electric motor (121 hp, 105 lb-ft torque)
* Features:
	+ Toyota Safety Sense 2.0 (TSS 2.0) suite with adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, and automatic emergency braking
	+ Available features: Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, 8-inch touchscreen, heated seats, and moonroof
* Fuel economy: up to 31 mpg city, 40 mpg highway (1.8L engine), 53 mpg city, 52 mpg highway (Hybrid)

**Hyundai Elantra (2022 and newer)**

* Redesigned for 2022, the Elantra features a more sculpted exterior, improved interior space, and updated technology.
* Available trim levels: SE, SEL, N Line, and Limited.
* Powertrain options:
	+ 2.0L 4-cylinder engine (147 hp, 132 lb-ft torque)
	+ 1.6L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine (201 hp, 195 lb-ft torque) on N Line and Limited trims
* Features:
	+ Hyundai SmartSense safety suite with forward collision avoidance, lane departure warning, and blind-spot monitoring
	+ Available features: 10.25-inch touchscreen, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, heated seats, and panoramic sunroof
* Fuel economy: up to 28 mpg city, 38 mpg highway (2.0L engine), 28 mpg city, 36 mpg highway (1.6L turbo engine)

**Mazda3 (2022 and newer)**

* Redesigned for 2022, the Mazda3 features a more premium interior, improved driving dynamics, and updated technology.
* Available trim levels: 2.0, 2.5S, 2.5 Turbo, and Premium.
* Powertrain options:
	+ 2.0L 4-cylinder engine (155 hp, 150 lb-ft torque)
	+ 2.5L 4-cylinder engine (186 hp, 186 lb-ft torque) on 2.5S and Premium trims
	+ 2.5L turbocharged 4-cylinder engine (250 hp, 320 lb-ft torque) on 2.5 Turbo trim
* Features:
	+ Mazda i-Activsense safety suite with adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, and automatic emergency braking
	+ Available features: 8.8-inch touchscreen, Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, heated seats, and moonroof
* Fuel economy: up to 28 mpg city, 39 mpg highway (2.0L engine), 27 mpg city, 36 mpg highway (2.5L engine), 23 mpg city, 31 mpg highway (2.5L turbo engine)
